A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie was a complete disgrace to Star Wars\, every plot point in Episodes 1-7 AND Rogue One\, George Lucas\, and screenwriting. it exists as a blend of left-wing political commercial\, social justice warrior propoganda\, diversity activism\, bad CW sci-fi show\, death to the concept of the Force\, continued wasted death to the heroes of Star Wars\, the least efficient telling of the worse excuse for a story\, contradictory and illogical events\, previous-storyline-nullifying presented facts\, and just downright toilet-worth mess. the mechanics of this movie aren't worthy of a straight-to-Netflix release. absolutely pathetic. Disney would've done better just to make a 5-minute film of Kathleen Kennedy talking into the camera -- espousing radical left-wing idiocy -- and wholly foregone the idea of a movie altogether.
